cwn_entry.cwn_title: Is there a 64 bits Native MinGW port?
cwn_entry.cwn_who: Matthieu Dubuget asked and David Allsopp replied
cwn_entry.cwn_what:
> in the README.win32 file of the last OCaml release, four ports are listed. > > > > Native MS Native MinGW Cygwin > > > > 64 bits? Win32 or Win64 Win32 only Win32 only > > Are there any problem with a 64 bits native MinGW port?
It was introduced in 4.00.0, though apparently README.win32 wasn't updated.

Thanks to Alp Mestan, we now include in the OCaml Weekly News the links to the recent posts from the ocamlcore planet blog at <http://planet.ocaml.org/>.
Why GADTs matter for performance: <https://blogs.janestreet.com/why-gadts-matter-for-performance/>
Announcing Lambdoc 1.0-beta3: <http://nleyten.com/post/2015/03/30/Announcing-Lambdoc-1.0-beta3>
Heap sort: <http://blog.shaynefletcher.org/2015/03/heap-sort.html>
